name: UILargeContentViewerInteractionDelegate
desc: An object that customizes the behavior of the large content viewer interactions.

items.name: func largeContentViewerInteraction(UILargeContentViewerInteraction, didEndOn: UILargeContentViewerItem?, at: CGPoint)
items.desc: Performs an action when the large content viewer gesture ends at the location of the specified item.

items.name: func largeContentViewerInteraction(UILargeContentViewerInteraction, itemAt: CGPoint) -> UILargeContentViewerItem?
items.desc: Identifies the large content viewer item for the specified interaction and location.

items.name: func viewController(for: UILargeContentViewerInteraction) -> UIViewController
items.desc: Specifies which view controller should display the large content viewer.
